title: Elon Musk's SpaceX acquiring AI startup xAI ahead of potential IPO
desc: Musk is combining rocket maker SpaceX with his AI startup, the largest tie-up in his expansive business portfolio.

title: Billionaire businessman Frank Stronach's sexual assault trial in Toronto starts Tuesday
desc: Frank Stronach's trial in Toronto gets underway Tuesday on charges of sexual assault against multiple women. Some of the allegations against the 93-year-old billionaire businessman date back nearly 50 years.

title: Nigeria Hands Over Africa Energy Bank HQ for June Launch
desc: Nigeria has officially handed over the headquarters for the Africa Energy Bank, paving the way for a June launch to finance oil and gas projects across Afr

title: Measles Hits ICE Family Detention Center in Texas
desc: The Department of Homeland Security has imposed a quarantine on a family detention center in Dilley, Texas, after two detainees contracted the disease.

title: San Francisco Bay Area rattled by series of early morning earthquakes
desc: A series of small earthquakes rattled the San Francisco Bay Area on Monday morning in an area that has had a lot of seismic activity in recent months.

title: B.C. premier doubles down on calling Alberta separatist movement seeking U.S. support 'treason'
desc: Calgary-based data analyst John Santos warns that that kind of language could push people toward separatism.
